description:
Abstractions make things appear simple. This is one of the main concepts
behind OOP. So what is it?! This talk provides some guidelines on how to
achieve scalable abstractions and demystify some of the confusion around
it. One could say, I'll try to abstract the abstraction itself :)

Terry Yanchynskyy Bio
---------------------

Terry (Taras) is a software engineer on the Payments team at
`Wave <https://www.waveapps.com/>`__. He is a co-organizer of Pycon
Canada 2016 and 2015. Before Wave, he was on the brandstem™ team at St
Joseph Communications. He also bears a few personal projects behind his
belt. His path to software engineering comes from a distant medical
degree, but he was always more fascinated by the "physiology" of the
computation. He also enjoys casual rides on his motorcycle, travelling,
and rock climbing.
title: A concrete approach to abstractions
